text:
Leonardo Wilhelm DiCaprio (born November 11, 1974) is an American actor, movie director, movie producer and writer. He starred in every popular movies, including "What's Eating Gilbert Grape", "Romeo + Juliet", "Titanic", "The Man in the Iron Mask", "The Beach", "Catch Me if You Can", "Gangs of New York", "The Aviator", "The Revenant" and "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood". His first movie was "Critters 3".
In 2016, DiCaprio won his first Academy Award for Best Actor for his portrayal of Hugh Glass in The Revenant.
Personal life.
DiCaprio was born in Los Angeles. His father, George, is of Italian and German, and his mother, Irmelin, is of German and Russian descent.
